name: SchemaBCTest
description: Tests for backward compatibility of schema changes in OpenAPI specifications.

test_cases.name: unchanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that the specification remains unchanged.

test_cases.name: changedButCompatible
test_cases.description: Asserts that the specification has changed but remains compatible.

test_cases.name: discriminatorChanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that the discriminator in the schema has changed, making the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestFormatDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that decreasing the request format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestFormatIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that increasing the request format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestPropsPutIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that increasing properties in a PUT request makes the specification changed but compatible.

test_cases.name: responseFormatDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that decreasing the response format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseFormatIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that increasing the response format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: responsePropsRequiredDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that decreasing required properties in the response makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: typeChanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that changing the type in the schema makes the specification incompatible.
